thread.title: Why Hong Kong children have fallen behind in science race, and the volunteers pushing them to catch up
thread.title_full: Why Hong Kong children have fallen behind in science race, and the volunteers pushing them to catch up

author: Stuart Heaver
title: Why Hong Kong children have fallen behind in science race, and the volunteers pushing them to catch up
text:
Hong Kong innovators Why Hong Kong children have fallen behind in science race, and the volunteers pushing them to catch up 
Despite some isolated success stories, interest among Hong Kong students in science is falling, with ignorant teachers and parents and school curriculum changes among the problems PUBLISHED : Thursday, 23 March, 2017, 6:17am UPDATED : Thursday, 23 March, 2017, 6:17am
